problem.markdown:
1. In free vibration experiment the damping may occur due to
(x) Friction at support and Hysteresis damping ( ) Hysteresis damping ( ) Friction at support ( ) None of the above
2. A body is said to undergo free vibration, when?
(x) It vibrates freely with no force acting on it ( ) It vibrates in free space ( ) The force causing the initial displacement is removed ( ) It vibrates freely with no resistive force acting on it
3. If energy is lost in any way during vibration, the system can be considered to be ?
( ) Underdamped ( ) Undamped ( ) Overdamped (x) Damped
problem.p: 1. In free vibration experiment the damping may occur due to

choicegroup.choice: Friction at support and Hysteresis damping

problem.p: 2. A body is said to undergo free vibration, when?

choicegroup.choice: It vibrates freely with no force acting on it
The force causing the initial displacement is removed
It vibrates freely with no resistive force acting on it

problem.p: 3. If energy is lost in any way during vibration, the system can be considered to be ?
